g.text: Authorize / Delete Authorization of "Kollection creator" address
for his organization, beneficiary, and karma dao
Publish activity update about the NFT
Dao member constantly check quality of updates
The owner of the token receives the remaning profit (ETH)
of te rewards goes to the Investor vault
Rewards to each DAO member who voted (ETH)
